nodes.text: Gun runner's pistols were a make of blaster pistol available during the Cold War. They were silver in color with yellow patterning on and several blue lights built in. Sergeant Blyes, a member of the Republic Military fighting in a civil war on the planet Ord Mantell during the Cold War owned one as part of his personal supply of weapons.

Blyes gave the gun runner's pistol to the smuggler known as Ace as a reward for disabling a number of signal jammer belonging to the Mantellian Separatist Movement during an assault on Drelliad village.

Gun runner's pistols are a low level weapon available in BioWare's 2011 MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic. It is available to character's of the Smuggler class for completion of an optional quest on their starting planet of Ord Mantell. There is currently no other way to obtain it in game and so players of other classes can only acquire it through trading with Imperial players currently having no way to own it.
